subsections.heading: Movistar (Telefónica Group)

- **Speed Optionen:** 300Mbps, 600Mbps Fiber (Standard In Costa Blanca)
- **Availability:** Near Universal In Developed Areas. Often Default In Neue Builds.
- **Contract:** 12-Monat Minimum Typical
- **Cost:** €40-55/Monat Für Fiber 300Mbps, €50-65/Monat Für 600Mbps
- **Bundled Option:** Internet + Mobile Combined Discounts Available (€60-80/Monat)

**Mobile Service:**
- Major Network Provider (Owns Infrastructure)
- Mobile Plans From €15-40/Monat
- Excellent Coverage Throughout Spanien
- Kann Add Zu Fiber Internet Für Bundle Discounts

**Advantages:**
- Reliability (Established Infrastructure)
- Ubiquity (Available Almost Everywhere)
- Technical Support (Spanisch, English Increasingly)
- Bundle Optionen (Internet + Mobile + TV)

**Disadvantages:**
- Premium Preisgestaltung (Largest Provider Advantage)
- Customer Service Reputation Mixed
- Contract Obligations Strong
- Slightly Slower Deployment Than Competitors

subsections.heading: Typical Neue Build Infrastructure
subsections.content:
**Developer Infrastructure Setup:**

Most Costa Blanca Neue Builds Completed 2020+ Haben Moderne Broadband Infrastruktur:

**Standard Setup:**
- Fiber Zu Home (FTTH - Fiber To The Home)
- Individual Fiber Connection Zu Each Unit
- Speeds: 300Mbps Standard, 600Mbps Increasingly Common
- Multiple Provider Ducts Installed (Allows Choice)

**Pre-2020 Buildings:** Können Haben Ältere Infrastruktur (Copper, Coaxial). Check Spezifisches Project.

**Infrastructure Reality:**
- Developer Installs Ducts/Conduits Für Providers
- Doesn't Guarantee Connection Bei Move-In
- Provider Installation Nimmt 2-3 Wochen Nach Signing
- Not Uncommon Für Delays (Especially Summer)

**What Zu Expect Timeline-Wise:**

1. **Keys Handover:** Usually Internet Not Yet Active
2. **Sign Contract Mit Provider:** Done Nach Keys, Connection Scheduled
3. **Wait 2-3 Wochen:** Provider Installs Fiber Zu Unit, Sets Up Modem
4. **Internet Activated:** Usually 2-3 Wochen From Signing
5. **Mobile Activated:** Simultaneously Oder Separately

subsections.heading: Fiber Speeds In Neue Builds
subsections.content:
**Typical Fiber Specifications In Costa Blanca Neue Builds:**

- **300Mbps:** Most Common Offering (Sufficient Für Remote Work, Streaming)
- **600Mbps:** Increasingly Standard (Excellent Für Multiple Users/Devices)
- **Gigabit (1Gbps):** Rare But Appearing In Premium Developments

**What Speeds Mean In Practice:**
- **300Mbps:** Video Calls, Streaming, Browsing, Gaming—No Issues. 4+ Simultaneous Streams Possible.
- **600Mbps:** Gaming, Video Calls, Large File Transfers, 4K Streaming Simultaneously—All Smooth
- **1Gbps:** Future-Proof, Overkill Für Current Residential Needs

**Cost Differences:**
- 300Mbps: €35-45/Monat
- 600Mbps: €45-55/Monat
- 1Gbps: €60-70/Monat (Rare Availability)

**Recommendation Für Remote Workers:** 300Mbps Minimum Acceptable. 600Mbps Ideal. Budget €40-50/Monat.

subsections.heading: Mobile Plan Optionen
subsections.content:
**Contract Plans (12-Monat Minimum Typical):**
- Usually Bundled Mit Internet: €60-80/Monat Total
- Cheaper Than Separate Mobile
- Fixed Number Changes (Rarely Available)
- Good Für: Settling Down, Working Professionelle
- Break Kosten: €100-300 If Canceling Early

**Prepaid Plans (Month-to-Month):**
- No Contract, Cancel Anytime
- More Expensive Per Month (€20-40 Für Reasonable Data)
- Best Für: Testing Providers, Flexible Relocators
- No Break Fees
- Good Für: Trial Periods Before Committing

**Data Allowances:**
- Budget: 10GB/Monat (€15-20 Prepaid, €10-15 Bundled)
- Standard: 20-50GB/Monat (€25-35 Prepaid, €15-25 Bundled)
- Unlimited: €40+ Prepaid, €25-30 Bundled
- EU Roaming: Included In All Plans (Use Same Data Allowance Across EU)

subsections.heading: Zu Getting Spanish Phone Nummern
subsections.content:
**Phone Nummern Assignment:**

When Signing Up Für Mobile Plan:
- Provider Assigns Spanische Nummern Automatically
- Starts Mit +34 91, 93, 96 Etc. (Area Codes)
- Takes Effect Within 24 Hours
- Ported From Another Operator If Switching

**Number Portability:**
- Spanisches Law Allows Keeping Nummern When Switching Providers
- Contact Old Provider: Request Portability Code
- New Provider Handles Transfer
- Process Nimmt 2-5 Working Days
- Some Providers Charge Small Fee (€5-10)

**International Calling:**
- UK Leute Call: +34 + Number
- You Call UK: +44 + Area Code/Number (Expensive Unless VoIP)
- WhatsApp/Viber Calls Free (Data-Based, Not Mobile Minutes)
- Skype/Facetime Good Für International Calls
